title: Formatting Tools for R Markdown Documents
text: Formatting tools R markdown documents. Provides small set tools common formatting tasks writing documents R Markdown Quarto Markdown. Works outputs html, pdf, docx possibly others. Currently one function, though plan include additional functions needed support repetitive formatting tasks arise projects, e.g. blog (.qmd files) R package vignettes (.Rmd files).
